description:
Can't beat location! Cozy 1 bedroom just a few blocks walking from Union Square, Chelsea Market, Highline, West Village, Flatiron, Madison Square Park, and unlimited shopping and restaurants! Practically on top of six train lines (F, M, 1, 2, 3, L),  and 2 blocks from even more at Union Square (N, Q, R, 4, 5, 6). You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the beautiful tree-lined block, and the coziness. It's perfect for couples, friends, and solo adventurers.

Please note: The bed is a (very comfortable!) air mattress. Sleeps 2. One additional person able to sleep on couch.

Full, private apartment access-- living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom.

I am located in New York and am happy to help in any way with my guests' trips!

Quiet, tree-lined block in the middle of everything! Amazing bars and restaurants right outside your door. Happy to provide a list of favorites upon booking :)

Attractions within walking distance:
Union Square
Chelsea Market
the Highline
Washington Square Park
Eataly
Madison Square Park
Flatiron Building

Attractions a short train ride away:
Times Square
Macy's
Grand Central
Central Park
One World Trade Center
Little Italy
Chinatown
Madison Square Garden
Bryant Park

1-2 blocks to almost all trains! F, M, L on same block; 1, 2, 3 one block away, N, Q, R, 4, 5, 6 two blocks away.

Street parking plus parking garage on same block.
name: Cute & Cozy in Chelsea/Union Square
review: The location was fantastic! Very central and within walking distance of so many great places. The subway was very close as well. The apartment is exactly as advertised.  The host was very helpful during a late check in and accommodated all requests. We would definitely stay here again!
